name: Snooker
overview: Snooker (Sometimes referred to as Snooker '83 due to the year of its release) This video game simulates the game of snooker on the major home computers of that era. The players take turns to hit a white cue ball against the reds or colours following the rules of snooker. The strength of the shot and the spin can be selected using the space bar and cursor keys respectively. The game received a mention in Zzap! 64's first magazine issue in their list of "Top 10 Tackiest Top Sellers", where the game reached 6th place, citing the limited colors.
